title.rendered: World Day for Safety & Health at work celebration

content.rendered: The World Day for Safety & Health at Work is the pinnacle of TTE Facilities Management’s perennial strong focus on Health & Safety which has robust commitment from leadership and accountability with every team member. For the annual event this year (28th April) TTE undertook initiatives that further emphasize this culture by conducting Wellness Programme Medical Checks at employee accommodation, Tool-Box Talks and Workshops on the Impact of Climate on Workers and the Annual Health & Safety Awards.
